Package com.example.eventlottery.fragments

Class BrowseFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.eventlottery.fragments.BrowseFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, EventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
public class BrowseFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment implements EventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
Fragment for browse functionaltiy, shows on main page ALlows user to scroll through event cards and select the event they want to join
